metadata.title: CVE-2019-13072 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Stored XSS in the Filters page (Name field) in ZoneMinder 1.32.3 allows amalicious user to embed and execute JavaScript code in the browser of anyuser who navigates to this page.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
